3750599.description: In 2004, the folks at Penny Arcade decided they wanted a show exclusively for gaming. Sure, comics, anime, and other nerd hobbies were cool, and those activities all had their own shows&hellip; so what about games? From that idea spawned a small 4,500 person event in Bellevue, Washington, focused on the culture and community that is gaming. Since then, the show hasn’t looked back. Doubling in size each year until venue capacities were reached, in 2010 the show expanded into Boston for PAX East, drawing tens of thousands of attendees in the inaugural year. The shows in Seattle and Boston represent the two largest gaming events in North America! PLEASE NOTE: In order to keep things fair, we currently have badge limits of 2 per person. If we determine that your are ordering under different names and multiple addresses, all of your orders will be cancelled immediately.

3752843.description: We've dedicated the two days before PAX Prime to the developer community for the craft that is game making. PAX Dev is about elevating the art and creating a place to share, debate and learn.

3817350.description: Taking place right before PAX Prime, we’ve dedicated two days to the developer community for the craft that is game making. PAX Dev is about elevating the art and creating a place to share, debate and learn. With no press access, developers can speak freely and focus entirely on their trade in a safe and comfortable environment. PAX Dev is open only to 18+ year old attendees.

3846764.description:
PLEASE NOTE: In order to keep things fair, we currently have badge limits of 2 per person. If we determine that your are ordering under different names and multiple addresses, all of your orders will be cancelled immediately.
In 2004, the folks at Penny Arcade decided they wanted a show exclusively for gaming. Sure, comics, anime, and other nerd hobbies were cool, and those activities all had their own shows&hellip; so what about games? From that idea spawned a small 4,500 person event in Bellevue, Washington, focused on the culture and community that is gaming.
Since then, the show hasn’t looked back. Doubling in size each year until venue capacities were reached, in 2010 the show expanded into Boston for PAX East, drawing tens of thousands of attendees in the inaugural year. The shows in Seattle and Boston represent the two largest gaming events in North America!
Tickets for BYOC will be available the week of July 14th.  Please check our website for additional information.
NO exchanges or refunds.
Children 6 and under are free with a paid adult.  Strollers are not permitted on the show floor at any time.

3852445.event: BYOC - Bring Your Own Computer to PAX Prime 2014
3852445.description: This badge will not get you into PAX, but when accompanied by a 4-day or single day PAX Badge, this grants entrance to a reserved space to set up your own computer in our PC area.  You won't need this if you just want to bring a laptop and hang out somewhere, but if you want bring in your gaming computer and have your own spot in our private BYOC area specifically for LAN gaming, that's where this badge comes in.
